The post: s caption was in Urdu language, translating to English as "Another medal of destruction for the country...!"
The claim stated that the International: ICAO) has issued a notice to Pakistan Civil Aviation Authority, barring them from issuing licenses to pilots, crew, or engineers.
The ICAO tweeted on September 24: 2020, stating that they had not issued the directive mentioned in the claim and called on various Twitter accounts to retract their statements.
